ch.cern.atlas.apvs.eventbus.shared

Class ResettableRemoteEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.web.bindery.event.shared.EventBus
      • com.google.web.bindery.event.shared.SimpleEventBus
        • ch.cern.atlas.apvs.eventbus.shared.RemoteEventBus
          • ch.cern.atlas.apvs.eventbus.shared.ResettableRemoteEventBus

  • public class ResettableRemoteEventBus
extends RemoteEventBus
    Wraps an EventBus to hold on to any HandlerRegistrations, so that they can easily all be cleared at once.
